LABEL.TUTORIALSETTINGSVIBRATION: Enables or disables the vibration when successfully scanned a QR-Code.
LABEL.TUTORIALSETTINGSZOOMING: Enables or disables the text zooming function.
LABEL.TUTORIALSETTINGSMUSIC: Enables or disables sound output. (Please only use it with headphones in the monestary)
LABEL.TUTORIALMENU: With this icon which is found in the upper left corner, you can open the menu, navigate through the whole app and set all settings.
LABEL.TUTORIALSCAN: Select this menu item to scan a QR-Code.
LABEL.TUTORIALMAP: Select this menu item to view the monestary map.
LABEL.TUTORIALHISTORY: Select this menu item to view your past scans.

MESSAGE.NOT_FOUND: No item was found. Please try again!
